string.value: The Maple Administrator says that a new function has become available. Go see the Maple Administrator.
You can find the party you want by pressing the hotkey O or the search button in the Party Window (hotkey P).
You can find the party you want by pressing the hotkey O or the search button in the Party Window (hotkey P).
Hello, #b#h0##k! I'd like to tell you about a great new function. Would you like to learn about it?
